issue.title: [CF 1600] PTR Game Freezing and Crash when open LUA snippets with some huge codes inside
issue.body:
Hello, I am new here but I work with lua and store all my files in TMW Lua snippets. I copied from live to ptr all settings and when I open Lua snippets in TMW it giving me game freeze and after that crash. I have several snippets with 600+ strings. I used stable and alpha builds, nothing doesn't help.


> Posted by CurseForge user cordankos | Imported from CurseForge issue #1600 | Raw

comments.body:
For some reason game started copy and paste any lua code over and over again inside TMW lua snippet box.

Edited Oct 21, 2018

> Posted by CurseForge user cordankos

What's with all the tags?

 

I'm really unclear on what you mean when you say that you "work with lua and store all [your] files in TMW Lua snippets". Are you saying you're using TMW's Lua snippets as a substitute for saving files on your computer?

 

And, when you say that you have several snippets with 600+ strings, what do you mean? Do you mean a Lua snippet that contains 600 or more string literals inside?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I just found bug on PTR that lua box doesn't work correctly. You can see yourself that its totally bugged if you trying to type anything.

 

I use lua snippets insde TMW as functions which cover place with 600+ strings literals. But as I noticed by PTR its totally doesn't matter. This bug even happen if you trying type anything even inside ICON > LUA condition.


> Posted by CurseForge user cordankos
